title: Ep. - 363 - OMID SCOBIE DISCUSSES THE ROYALS, PRINCE HARRY AND MEGHAN MARKLE REVIEW OF PINK DOCUMENTARY
description:
Omid Scobie is a London-based writer, royal editor for Harper’s Bazaar, an ABC News contributor, “Good Morning America” regular and host of ABC’s popular royal podcast, “The Heir Pod.” Scobie has become an authoritative voice on the lives and philanthropic endeavors of the Royal Family’s younger members and maintains strong access to the Sussexes’ working world. He is the co-author of Finding Freedom: Harry and Meghan and the Making of a Modern Royal Family. We discuss Prince Harry’s interview with Oprah, and his Apple TV series The Me You Can’t See.

 

Steve Stauff reviews the documentary P!NK: All I Know So Far follows, which follows P!NK as she embarked on her record-breaking 2019 “Beautiful Trauma” world tour while trying to balance being a mom, a wife, a boss and a performer.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: https://twitter.com/katecasey

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/katecaseyca

Tik Tok: http://www.tiktok.com/itskatecasey

Clubhouse: @katecasey 

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245

Amazon.com: www.amazon.com/shop/katecasey
